description: This file defines the authentication context and provider components for a React application. It manages authentication state including login, logout, and user profile fetching, utilizing hooks and context to provide auth functionality throughout the app.

methods.name: AuthProvider
methods.description: Provides authentication state and actions to descendant components, handling token persistence, session restoration, and side effects related to authentication.

methods.name: useAuth
methods.description: Hook for consuming authentication context; must be used within the AuthProvider.

methods.name: login
methods.description: Performs login by sending credentials to backend, storing token, and fetching user profile.

methods.name: logout
methods.description: Clears authentication state and redirects to login page.

methods.name: me
methods.description: Fetches the current user's profile from backend.
